programme.desc: Sonic, Knuckles and Tails reunite to battle Shadow, a mysterious new enemy with powers unlike anything they've faced before. With their abilities outmatched in every way, they seek out an unlikely alliance to stop Shadow and protect the planet.

programme.title: Doubt
programme.desc: Suspicions of child abuse fuel a traditionalist nun's (Meryl Streep) personal crusade against a popular priest (Philip Seymour Hoffman) who wants to reform her school's strict customs.

programme.title: The Curious Case of Benjamin Button
programme.desc: Benjamin Button (Brad Pitt) is born an old man in 1918 New Orleans and ages in reverse and, in so doing, becomes intimately familiar with the natures of love and death.

programme.title: The Shawshank Redemption
programme.desc: Two life sentences for a 1947 double murder land an innocent man (Tim Robbins) in a corrupt Maine penitentiary.

programme.title: Challengers
programme.desc: Tensions run high when a grand slam tennis champion finds himself standing across the net from the once-promising, now burnt-out Patrick, his former best friend and his wife's former boyfriend.

programme.title: September 5
programme.desc: During the 1972 Munich Olympics, an American sports broadcasting crew finds itself thrust into covering the hostage crisis involving Israeli athletes.

programme.title: The Magnificent Seven
programme.desc: A man in black (Yul Brynner) recruits six hired guns to lead Mexican villagers against the gang of an outlaw (Eli Wallach).

programme.title: The Magnificent Seven Ride!
programme.desc: A marshal (Lee Van Cleef), an Eastern reporter and five ex-convicts rescue widows from Mexican bandits.

programme.title: The Magnificent Seven Ride!
programme.desc: A marshal (Lee Van Cleef), an Eastern reporter and five ex-convicts rescue widows from Mexican bandits.

programme.title: Heartbreakers
programme.desc: Mother and daughter con-artists (Sigourney Weaver, Jennifer Love Hewitt) try to swindle a cigarette tycoon, but things go wrong when one falls in love.

programme.title: 13 Hours: The Secret Soldiers of Benghazi
programme.desc: Six members (James Badge Dale, John Krasinski, Max Martini) of the Annex Security Team defend the U.S. Consulate in Benghazi, Libya, from an attack by Islamic militants.

programme.title: Braveheart
programme.desc: Enraged by the killing of his wife, Scotsman William Wallace (Mel Gibson) leads a revolt against the tyrannical English king (Patrick McGoohan) in the 13th century.

programme.title: September 5
programme.desc: During the 1972 Munich Olympics, an American sports broadcasting crew finds itself thrust into covering the hostage crisis involving Israeli athletes.

programme.title: Yours, Mine & Ours
programme.desc: A household threatens to burst at the seams when the marriage of two widowed parents creates a family of 18 children.

programme.title: Some Kind of Wonderful
programme.desc: A grease monkey's (Eric Stoltz) tomboy friend (Mary Stuart Masterson) helps him woo a popular girl (Lea Thompson) in their Los Angeles high school.

programme.title: Shaun of the Dead
programme.desc: An aimless TV salesman (Simon Pegg) and his best pal must save their friends and family from the zombies that have overrun London.

programme.title: Mean Girls
programme.desc: A new student gets welcomed into the top of the social food chain by an elite group of popular girls called the Plastics. However, when she makes the misstep of falling for the queen bee's ex-boyfriend, she finds herself caught in their crosshairs.

programme.title: Zoolander 2
programme.desc: A special agent recruits former models Derek Zoolander and Hansel to save the world's most beautiful people from a deadly plot.

programme.title: Bottoms
programme.desc: Unpopular best friends PJ and Josie start a high school fight club to meet girls and lose their virginity. They soon find themselves in over their heads when the most popular students start beating each other up in the name of self-defense.

programme.title: A Good Person
programme.desc: After surviving an unimaginable tragedy, a woman emerges from recovery with an opioid addiction and unresolved grief. However, her unlikely friendship with her would-be father-in-law gives her a fighting chance to put her life back together.

programme.title: Blame It on Rio
programme.desc: A middle-aged coffee broker (Michael Caine) eyes his partner's (Joseph Bologna) nubile teenage daughter (Michelle Johnson) on vacation in Brazil.

programme.title: Return of the Seven
programme.desc: The man in black (Yul Brynner) forms a new Magnificent Seven, to save Mexican farmers from slave labor.

programme.title: Return of the Seven
programme.desc: The man in black (Yul Brynner) forms a new Magnificent Seven, to save Mexican farmers from slave labor.

programme.title: Paranormal Activity 3
programme.desc: A videographer becomes obsessed with finding the source of disturbing late-night noises in his home and discovers its terrifying origin.

programme.title: Unseen
programme.desc: Sam, a gas station clerk, receives a random call from Emily, a nearly blind woman who's running from her murderous ex in the woods. Using a phone, Sam becomes Emily's only chance for survival as she guides the terrified woman through a video call.

programme.title: The Town That Dreaded Sundown
programme.desc: A masked maniac terrorizes the same small community where a murderer known as the Phantom Killer struck decades earlier.

programme.title: A Fistful of Dynamite
programme.desc: A thief and a dynamite-tossing Irish revolutionary inadvertently become embroiled in the Mexican Revolution.

programme.title: Dressed to Kill
programme.desc: A psychiatrist (Michael Caine), a prostitute (Nancy Allen) and the son of a slain woman (Angie Dickinson) seek a Manhattan slasher.

programme.title: Vanilla Sky
programme.desc: A wealthy womanizer (Tom Cruise) has trouble distinguishing dreams from reality after a car accident leaves him disfigured.

programme.title: Hoodlum
programme.desc: Mobster Ellsworth "Bumpy" Johnson (Laurence Fishburne) vies with rival Dutch Schultz (Tim Roth) for control of illegal gambling in 1930s Harlem.

programme.title: No Country for Old Men
programme.desc: An aging lawman (Tommy Lee Jones) reflects on his past and laments a changing world while trying to find and protect a hunter who took the cash from a drug deal gone bad.

programme.title: Basic Instinct
programme.desc: A woman suspected of murdering her lover with an ice pick ensnares a San Francisco cop in a web of lust and deceit.

programme.title: The Craft
programme.desc: Teen misfits befriend a suicidal newcomer and strike back at their tormentors with witchcraft in Los Angeles.

programme.title: Rolling Thunder
programme.desc: A Vietnam POW (William Devane) comes home to Texas and soon, with his buddy (Tommy Lee Jones), must avenge his slain family.

programme.title: When Worlds Collide
programme.desc: A pilot (Richard Derr), his girlfriend (Barbara Rush) and lottery winners escape by rocket to another planet before a star hits Earth.

programme.title: The Queen
programme.desc: Queen Elizabeth II and Prime Minister Tony Blair try to reach a compromise in determining the royal family's public reaction to Princess Diana's death.

programme.title: Star Trek: Section 31
programme.desc: Emperor Philippa Georgiou faces the sins of her past after joining a secret division of Starfleet that's tasked with protecting the United Federation of Planets.

programme.title: Nobody's Fool
programme.desc: Wild child Tanya looks to her buttoned-up, by-the-book sister Danica to help her get back on her feet. As these polar opposites collide, Tanya soon discovers that Danica's picture-perfect life and boyfriend may not be what they seem.

programme.title: G.I. Jane
programme.desc: A female Navy SEALs recruit (Demi Moore) completes rigorous training under a tough officer's (Viggo Mortensen) command.

programme.title: Book Club
programme.desc: Four friends' lives are turned upside down when their book club tackles the infamous "50 Shades of Grey." From discovering new romance to rekindling old flames, they inspire each other to make their next chapter the best chapter.

programme.title: The First Wives Club
programme.desc: Three 50-ish college friends (Goldie Hawn, Bette Midler, Diane Keaton) plot revenge after their husbands dump them for younger women.

programme.title: Motherhood
programme.desc: A bitter New York mom (Uma Thurman) faces unexpected challenges while preparing for her daughter's birthday.

programme.title: Nobody's Fool
programme.desc: Wild child Tanya looks to her buttoned-up, by-the-book sister Danica to help her get back on her feet. As these polar opposites collide, Tanya soon discovers that Danica's picture-perfect life and boyfriend may not be what they seem.

programme.title: Couples Therapy
programme.desc: Alison and Rod unpack their history of bickering; Jessica vents over her feelings for Boris; Mondo feels like a parent with his deaf partner Kyle; Nick and Katherine recount a revelatory trip that sent shock waves through their marriage.

programme.title: Couples Therapy
programme.desc: Kyle reveals the origins of his desire for sexual freedom; Boris and Jessica unravel their whirlwind trajectory; Alison tries a new tactic with Rod; Katherine and Nick throw a party that triggers a deep dive into Nick's relationship with his mother.

programme.title: Couples Therapy
programme.desc: Boris feels like their therapy is making him look like a monster; Orna explores Katherine and Nick's inability to connect; Rod and Alison are challenged on their attack and avoid dynamic; Mondo confronts Kyle over his refusal to be monogamous.

programme.title: G.I. Jane
programme.desc: A female Navy SEALs recruit (Demi Moore) completes rigorous training under a tough officer's (Viggo Mortensen) command.

programme.title: Star Trek: Section 31
programme.desc: Emperor Philippa Georgiou faces the sins of her past after joining a secret division of Starfleet that's tasked with protecting the United Federation of Planets.

programme.title: Bound
programme.desc: A mobster's (Joe Pantoliano) disgruntled girlfriend (Jennifer Tilly) steals $2 million from him with the help of her lesbian lover (Gina Gershon).

programme.title: Mercy
programme.desc: An ex-military doctor finds herself in a fight for survival when the Irish mafia seizes control of the hospital at which she works. When her son is taken hostage, she's forced to rely on her battle-hardened past and lethal skills to save the day.

programme.title: In Her Skin
programme.desc: The parents (Guy Pearce, Miranda Otto) of a missing girl launch a frantic search for their daughter, unaware that the child's former baby sitter (Ruth Bradley) has murdered her.

programme.title: London Town
programme.desc: A teenage boy receives a tape of The Clash's White Riot in the mail from his estranged mother and sets out to find her.

programme.title: London Town
programme.desc: A teenage boy receives a tape of The Clash's White Riot in the mail from his estranged mother and sets out to find her.

programme.title: Soapdish
programme.desc: The star (Sally Field) of a soap opera is rattled by her ex-lover's (Kevin Kline) return to the daytime drama The Sun Also Sets.

programme.title: Monstrous
programme.desc: A terrifying new horror awaits Laura and her 7-year-old son, Cody, when they flee her abusive ex-husband and try to settle into a new life. Still traumatized, their fragile existence is pushed to the breaking point.

programme.title: A Mighty Heart
programme.desc: Mariane Pearl (Angelina Jolie) begins a terrifying search for her husband, journalist Daniel Pearl (Dan Futterman), after he is kidnapped by terrorists in 2002 Pakistan.

programme.title: Bad Moms
programme.desc: Pushed beyond their limits, three overworked and stressed-out mothers (Mila Kunis, Kristen Bell, Kathryn Hahn) go wild after ditching their daily routines.

programme.title: Love, Rosie
programme.desc: Rosie and Alex are best friends until Alex's family moves to America. They gamble everything to keep their love and friendship alive over the years and miles.

programme.title: The Girl on the Train
programme.desc: Rachel, who is devastated by her divorce, spends her commute fantasizing about the couple that lives in a house that her train passes. One morning, she sees something shocking and becomes entangled in a missing person's investigation.

programme.title: Cold Mountain
programme.desc: During the Civil War, a wounded Confederate soldier (Jude Law) abandons his duties to make his way home to his sweetheart (Nicole Kidman).

programme.title: Past Lives
programme.desc: Nora and Hae Sung, two deeply connected childhood friends, are wrest apart after Nora's family emigrates from South Korea. Decades later, they are reunited for one fateful week as they confront destiny, love and the choices that make a life.

programme.title: Minari
programme.desc: A Korean American family moves to an Arkansas farm in search of its own American dream. Amidst the challenges of this new life in the strange and rugged Ozarks, they discover the undeniable resilience of family and what really makes a home.

programme.title: Revolutionary Road
programme.desc: In 1950s Connecticut, two suburbanites (Leonardo DiCaprio, Kate Winslet) become increasingly dissatisfied with their marriage and society's expectations of conformity.

programme.title: Frida
programme.desc: Mexican painter Frida Kahlo (Salma Hayek) marries fellow artist Diego Rivera who shares her radical political views.

programme.title: A Mighty Heart
programme.desc: Mariane Pearl (Angelina Jolie) begins a terrifying search for her husband, journalist Daniel Pearl (Dan Futterman), after he is kidnapped by terrorists in 2002 Pakistan.

programme.title: Mansfield Park
programme.desc: Sent to live with relatives by her impoverished parents, a girl grows up, becomes a writer and falls in love.

programme.title: Cinma
programme.desc: Jeanne uses her charms and intelligence to climb the social ladder. Against all convention, she becomes one of the favorites of King Louis XV and moves to Versailles.

programme.title: Finding Neverland
programme.desc: Writer J.M. Barrie (Johnny Depp) befriends a widow (Kate Winslet) and her four sons who inspire him to create the character Peter Pan.

programme.title: You Hurt My Feelings
programme.desc: A novelist's long-standing marriage is suddenly upended when she overhears her husband give his honest reaction to her latest book.

programme.title: I.Q.
programme.desc: Albert Einstein (Walter Matthau) plays matchmaker for his egghead niece (Meg Ryan) and an unschooled auto mechanic (Tim Robbins).

programme.title: Sheryl
programme.desc: Singer-songwriter Sheryl Crow rises to superstardom and finds a way to turn even her darkest experiences into captivating, timeless work -- creating a legacy that continues to inspire and influence generations.

programme.title: Breathe
programme.desc: Maya and her young daughter are forced to live underground when Earth is left uninhabitable due to a lack of oxygen. They soon find themselves in a fight for survival when a mysterious couple arrive and claim to know the fate of Maya's husband.

programme.title: The Lodge
programme.desc: During a family retreat to a remote winter cabin, a man leaves his two children in the care of his new girlfriend, Grace. Isolated and alone, a blizzard traps them inside the lodge as terrifying events summon specters from Grace's dark past.

programme.title: Rumours
programme.desc: Leaders of the world's wealthiest democracies become spectacles of incompetence, contending with increasingly surreal obstacles as night falls in the misty woods and they realize they are suddenly alone.

programme.title: The Uninvited
programme.desc: A ghost prompts a lethal battle of wills between a man's new fiancee (Elizabeth Banks) and his two daughters (Emily Browning, Arielle Kebbel), one of whom has just returned from a mental ward.

programme.title: I.S.S.
programme.desc: Tensions flare in the near future aboard the International Space Station when a worldwide conflict breaks out on Earth. Soon, the U.S. and Russian astronauts each receive orders from the ground: take control of the station by any means necessary.

programme.title: Wild Eyed and Wicked
programme.desc: A woman tries to strike back at the medieval creature that's haunted her family for generations. To do so, she must learn how to draw upon a time of steel and blade when armor-clad knights rode out and dueled monsters to the death.

programme.title: Breathe
programme.desc: Maya and her young daughter are forced to live underground when Earth is left uninhabitable due to a lack of oxygen. They soon find themselves in a fight for survival when a mysterious couple arrive and claim to know the fate of Maya's husband.

programme.title: Sheryl
programme.desc: Singer-songwriter Sheryl Crow rises to superstardom and finds a way to turn even her darkest experiences into captivating, timeless work -- creating a legacy that continues to inspire and influence generations.

programme.title: Parallel
programme.desc: Following the journey of Vanessa, a grief-stricken woman who mysteriously finds herself navigating between parallel spaces.

programme.title: Together Together
programme.desc: A young loner becomes a surrogate mother for a single, middle-aged man who wants a child. Their unexpected relationship soon challenges their perceptions of connection, boundaries and the particulars of love.

programme.title: Becoming Jane
programme.desc: Though her parents expect her to marry a wealthy suitor, young Jane Austen (Anne Hathaway) becomes involved with a penniless lawyer (James McAvoy) who inspires her future writings.

programme.title: Roman Holiday
programme.desc: A young princess (Audrey Hepburn), tired of her constraints, runs off with a U.S. newsman (Gregory Peck) in Rome.

programme.title: Indecent Proposal
programme.desc: A Las Vegas mystery man (Robert Redford) offers a desperate couple (Demi Moore, Woody Harrelson) $1 million for a night with the wife.

programme.title: Nothing Compares
programme.desc: Following the career of singer Sinad O'Connor through her rise to fame and how her iconoclastic personality led to her exile from the pop mainstream.

programme.title: Twisted
programme.desc: With help from her partner (Andy Garcia), a police inspector (Ashley Judd) searches for a killer who is murdering her former lovers.

programme.title: The Stepford Wives
programme.desc: A man (Matthew Broderick) and his wife (Nicole Kidman) move to a quaint suburb where most of the women seem to have the same bland personality.

programme.title: Nobody's Fool
programme.desc: Wild child Tanya looks to her buttoned-up, by-the-book sister Danica to help her get back on her feet. As these polar opposites collide, Tanya soon discovers that Danica's picture-perfect life and boyfriend may not be what they seem.

programme.title: Jersey Girl
programme.desc: A young woman (Liv Tyler) changes the life of a single father (Ben Affleck) who used to be a successful New York music publicist.

programme.title: Failure to Launch
programme.desc: The parents of a young man (Matthew McConaughey) who still lives at home hire a beautiful woman (Sarah Jessica Parker) to entice him to finally leave the nest.

programme.title: Regarding Henry
programme.desc: Two bullets force a career-driven Manhattan lawyer (Harrison Ford) to start life over with his loving wife (Annette Bening) and daughter.

programme.desc: A man (Matthew Broderick) and his wife (Nicole Kidman) move to a quaint suburb where most of the women seem to have the same bland personality.

programme.title: South Park

programme.title: South Park

programme.title: South Park

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Kyle que ir a um concerto, mas seus pais no deixam. Cartman sugere que ele v polcia e diga que seus pais o molestaram, para que assim eles sejam presos.

programme.desc: As notcias sobre a existncia de um atacante de chamas mandam Raimon para Okinawa, esperando que seja Gouenji Shuuya. Mas que coisas inesperadas podem acontecer ao longo do caminho.
programme.sub-title: A grande batalha no mar do sul

programme.title: Super Onze
programme.desc: Logo aps chegar a Okinawa, Raimon inicia a busca pelo atacante. Enquanto procuram, Fubuki e Domon encontram um jogador que afirma ser o atacante.

programme.title: Super Onze
programme.desc: O tsunami revela a Raimon que ele se juntou ao clube de futebol da escola e eles querem brincar com eles. Raimon vai para o Oumihara Junior High, e o jogo comea.
programme.sub-title: O jogo de futebol rtmico radical

programme.title: Super Onze
programme.desc: O jogo entre Raimon e Oumihara continua, sem nenhuma das equipes se afastando. No final, Raimon vence, mas uma vitria estreita.

programme.title: Super Onze
programme.desc: O Epsilon se tornou o Epsilon Remastered e desafia Raimon para a batalha. Mas no so apenas eles que esto nivelados, Raimon tambm. Mas eles ainda no conseguem romper as tcnicas de Desarm, nem mesmo Fubuki.

programme.title: Super Onze
programme.desc: A partida entre Raimon e Epsilon Remastered continua sua segunda metade. Embora eles tentem o seu melhor, Desarm muito rpido e poderoso para eles.

programme.title: Super Onze
programme.desc: O retorno de Gouenji, juntamente com a vitria contra o Epsilon Remastered, elevaram o esprito de Raimon. Eles decidem voltar para casa para descansar. Mas assim que eles voltam, Diamond Dust quer que Raimon os enfrente em um jogo.
programme.sub-title: A escurido congelante da poeira de diamante

programme.title: Super Onze
programme.desc: O tcnico Hitomiko decide remover Endou como goleiro e pede que ele se torne um libero. Depois disso, Aphrodi se tornar um atacante e Tachimukai se tornar o novo goleiro de Raimon.

programme.title: Super Onze
programme.desc: O Raimon Eleven chega a Teikoku para treinamento, conforme solicitado por Kidou. Kidou tambm pede que seus ex-colegas de equipe - o time Teikoku jogue um amistoso contra o Raimon com Endou, Kidou e Domon do lado de Teikoku.

programme.title: Super Onze
programme.desc: Prominence e Diamond Dust se combinaram para se tornar a equipe mais forte do universo - The Chaos - e desafiam Raimon para um jogo. Este o primeiro jogo que Raimon joga em sua nova formao.

programme.title: Super Onze
programme.desc: Graas a Otomura, Kidou descobre como parar o ritmo do Caos. O fluxo do jogo totalmente revertido, pois Raimon continua marcando sem parar.

programme.title: Super Onze

programme.title: Super Onze

programme.title: Super Onze
programme.desc: A primeira metade da partida de Raimon contra o The Genesis comeou. No entanto, ainda h mais um problema na equipe, e esse problema s pode ser respondido pela pessoa com um problema, Fubuki Shirou.

programme.title: Super Onze
programme.desc: O Genesis rompeu com o evoludo Mugen The Hand, e assume a liderana mais uma vez. Irritado com a observao de Seijirou de que Raimon o mesmo que Gnesis, Endou tenta furiosamente provar que ele est errado.

programme.title: Super Onze

programme.sub-title: O Raimon vs. Raimon se enfrentam

programme.title: Super Onze
programme.desc: O Raimon Eleven retorna Raimon Junior High apenas para encontrar Ryichi Kenzaki esperando por eles l, junto com os antigos membros de Raimon que deixaram a equipe devido a ferimentos.

programme.title: Super Onze
programme.desc: Mesmo tendo perdido 2 pontos no primeiro tempo, Raimon nunca desiste e recupera 2 pontos no segundo tempo. No entanto, as coisas pioram quando os Imperadores das Trevas comeam a atacar violentamente.
programme.sub-title: A equipe mais forte do mundo verso da Blizzard

programme.title: Super Onze

programme.title: Super Onze

programme.title: Super Onze
programme.desc: O jogo comear, decidindo quem representar o Japo. Durante toda a partida, os jogadores apelam ferozmente para serem escolhidos para a equipe nacional.

programme.title: Super Onze

programme.title: Super Onze
programme.desc: No importa o que Endou e os outros faam, o treinador Kudou no os deixar deixar o prdio onde esto hospedados. Mas, por alguma razo, deixe Toramaru ir para casa.

programme.title: Super Campees: Captain Tsubasa
programme.desc: Ainda nas semifinais do torneio, comea a partida entre Meiwa e Furano. Hyuga demonstra seu estilo agressivo, em contraste com Matsuyama do Furano.

programme.desc: Nankatsu e Musashi se encontram nas semifinais do torneio nacional. Tsubasa enfrenta Jun Misugi, famoso por seu talento, liderana e preciso.

programme.title: Super Campees: Captain Tsubasa
programme.desc: Misugi prende Tsubasa, impossibilitando qualquer pontuao. Graas a Wakabayashi, Roberto e Misaki, Tsubasa tira suas dvidas e decide jogar com tudo.

programme.title: Super Campees: Captain Tsubasa
programme.desc: Com a ajuda de Misaki, Tsubasa consegue empatar a partida e ter uma ltima chance de vencer o time de Musashi. Ele conseguir derrotar Misugi?

programme.desc: Agora que o time dos Meiwa voltou vida, Hyuga empata com a ajuda de Takeshi Sawada e, minutos antes de acabar o jogo, marca vantagem.

programme.desc: Nankatsu o campeo do torneio nacional, e seu capito, Tsubasa Ozora, levanta a bandeira com orgulho e alegria como sinal de vitria.

programme.title: Super Campees: Captain Tsubasa

programme.title: Super Campees: Captain Tsubasa

programme.title: Super Campees: Captain Tsubasa

programme.title: Super Campees: Captain Tsubasa

programme.title: Super Campees: Captain Tsubasa

programme.title: Super Campees: Captain Tsubasa
programme.desc: Faltam alguns minutos para o fim, e o time de Nankatsu no consegue se aproximar da pequena rea. Os irmos Tachibana tentaro uma nova estratgia.

programme.title: Super Campees: Captain Tsubasa

programme.title: Super Campees: Captain Tsubasa

programme.title: Super Campees: Captain Tsubasa
programme.desc: Depois de uma desvantagem esmagadora, proporcionada pela dupla Hirado, Tsubasa decide arriscar e tenta dar o famoso chute com o efeito de Roberto.

programme.title: Super Campees: Captain Tsubasa
programme.desc: Nas semifinais, o primeiro a jogar o Meiwa contra Toho. Sem Hyuga na quadra, Meiwa tira vantagem de Toho, enquanto Hyuga assite o jogo do banco.

programme.title: Super Campees: Captain Tsubasa
programme.desc: No ltimo jogo das semifinais, Nankatsu enfrenta Furano e seu capito, Hikaru Matsuyama, vestindo o nmero dez como Tsubasa. Quem ir para a final?

programme.title: Super Campees: Captain Tsubasa
programme.desc: Furano empata na segunda metade da partida. Os ferimentos de Tsubasa esto piorando, mas ele tenta chutar mais uma vez. Matsuyama tenta impedi-lo.

programme.title: Super Campees: Captain Tsubasa
programme.desc: Na final do torneio, Tsubasa espera se recuperar de sua leso para jogar contra Toho. Hyuga decide pedir ao treinador Kitazune que o deixe jogar.

programme.title: Super Campees: Captain Tsubasa
programme.desc: Estamos nos primeiros cinco minutos do jogo entre Nankatsu e Toho, e a tenso na quadra pode ser cortada com uma faca.

programme.title: Super Campees: Captain Tsubasa
programme.desc: Apesar da disciplina de Nankatsu, Toho domina com dois gols de diferena graas ao seu capito, Kojiro Hyuga, e ao seu poderoso chute de tigre.

programme.title: Super Campees: Captain Tsubasa
programme.desc: Apesar da recomendao mdica, Tsubasa quer continuar na quadra. Ishizaki e os outros tentam defender o gol. Hyuga usa seu famoso chute de tigre.

programme.title: Super Campees: Captain Tsubasa
programme.desc: Nankatsu e Toho tm trs gols cada. No calor da partida, Takasugi de Nankatsu comete uma falta, dando a Hyuga um chute livre. Ele marcar um gol?

programme.title: Super Campees: Captain Tsubasa
programme.desc: Se empatarem na prorrogao, os dois times sero campees, mas Tsubasa e Hyuga no querem dividir o ttulo. Este o ltimo jogo de Tsubasa no Japo.

programme.title: Super Campees: Captain Tsubasa
programme.desc: Hyuga e Tsubasa esto mostrando seu talento, e os chutes so dignos desta final. Todos sabem que, no fundo, um duelo pessoal. Quem ser o campeo?

programme.title: November Man: Um Espio Nunca Morre
programme.desc: Peter Devereaux um agente da CIA que se afasta do ramo da espionagem, mas trazido de volta depois de cinco anos quando enviado para uma tarefa fora dos trmites oficiais da CIA, mas percebe que h bem mais interesses por trs desta situao

programme.title: Trfico Humano

programme.title: Perigo em Bangkok
programme.desc: Joe um assassino que est na Tailndia para realizar quatro assassinatos sob encomenda. Os alvos so inimigos de Surat, um chefo do crime local. Para no ter que realizar o trabalho sozinho ele contrata Kong, um batedor de carteiras.

programme.title: O ltimo assalto
programme.desc: Trs idosos veteranos do crime decidem participar de um roubo a um cofre subterrneo do depsito de jias Hatton Garden, em Londres. Com uma furadeira industrial, os criminosos planejam entrar para a Histria atravessando as paredes do cofre em dois dias.

programme.title: A Filha do General
programme.desc: Dois investigadores do Exrcito revelam um escndalo multilateral quando provam o assassinato brutal de um oficial.

programme.title: Vingana Implacvel

programme.title: Operao Perigosa
programme.desc: Depois que uma transao de drogas no d certo, dois traficantes nova-iorquinos se deslocam para Miami, onde estabelecem uma operao de fraude de crdito lucrativo.

programme.title: Redeno

programme.title: Dupla em Fria
programme.desc: Uma onda de assassinatos sacode Hong Kong. O jovem detetive Wang Bu Er tem certeza de que eles so o trabalho de um assassino em sriee, junto com Huang Fei Hong, um mestre do kung, eles empreendem uma aventura em ritmo acelerado para investigar o caso.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: As Feras Ressuscitadas!
programme.desc: Os ninjas da equipe guy se preocupam com o resultado da luta desesperada de sakura e vov chiyo, enquanto enfrentam suas cpias.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Kakashi Iluminado
programme.desc: Sakura corre para achar naruto com a vov chiyo, que est sofrendo com o veneno. Os membros da equipe guy correm paraajudar a equipe kakashi. Enquanto isso, com as preparaes completas, kakashi revela seu mangekyo sharingan.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Esttica De Um Momento
programme.desc: Na Aldeia da Folha, a equipe de Konohamaru foi promovida a Genin e agora est sob a superviso de Ebisu. Um Naruto mais velho chega aldeia aps uma longa jornada de treinamento com Jiraiya. Naruto Uzumaki est de volta!

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Legado
programme.desc: Jiraiya traz notcias altamente secretas de que os Akatsuki entraram em ao. Naruto e Sakura propem a Kakashi um desafio de sobrevivncia. Na Aldeia da Areia, Gaara o Kazekage agora, e membros da Akatsuki se infiltram na aldeia.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Volta Do Kazekage
programme.desc: As habilidades de Naruto e Sakura foram Kakashi a usar seu sharingan imediatamente. Naruto lana um jutsu aps outro. Sakura usa tcnicas ensinadas a ela por Tsunade. Deidara da Akatsuki comea uma operao secreta para se infiltrar na Aldeia da Areia.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Um Novo Alvo
programme.desc: Gaara percebe a presena de Deidara e comea uma batalha area na areia. O jonin da areia Yura, um agente da Akatsuki, e a Aldeia da Areia sofre danos. Na Aldeia da Folha, Naruto e Sakura veem o incrvel poder de Kakashi. A dupla d seu golpe final.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Formao! A Nova Equipe Kakashi
programme.desc: Naruto e Sakura derrotam Kakashi. Tsunade os nomeia como uma equipe de trs liderados por Kakashi, dizendo que agora so todos iguais. Gaara e Deidara continuam sua batalha. Baki fica preocupado que o shukaku se materialize, mas Kankuro ri da ideia.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Uma Adio Indesejada
programme.desc: Para proteger sua aldeia da argila explosiva de Deidara, Gaara usa seu chakra para criar um escudo. A aldeia salva a um enorme custo. Gaara fica vulnervel. As tentativas de seus companheiros so inteis, e Gaara acaba caindo nas mos de Deidara.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Falso Sorriso
programme.desc: Gaara arrastado para longe por Deidara. Kankuro sai com um peloto para salvar Gaara, mas os Akatsuki haviam instalado armadilhas engenhosas. Determinado, Kankuro encontra sozinho os Akatsuki. A nova equipe de Naruto comemora sua primeira misso.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Sem Ttulo
programme.desc: Temari encontra Kakashi e sua equipe. Naruto explode de raiva pelos Akatsuki. Como tambm hospeda uma besta de cauda dentro de si, Naruto entende o que Gaara est sofrendo. Kankuro infectado por um veneno. Sem um antdoto, ele ter poucos dias de vida.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Simulao
programme.desc: Chega uma mensagem da Aldeia da Areia sobre o sequestro do Kazekage. Tsunade manda a equipe Kakashi para a aldeia. Kankuro comea a batalha contra os Akatsuki, mas as tticas dos bonecos no funcionam. Seu oponente foi quem desenvolveu essas tticas.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Ponte Tenchi
programme.desc: Os ninjas tentam salvar Kankuro. Vov Chiyo, perita em veneno, chamada. Uma tempestade de areia atrasa Naruto, Sakura e Kakashi. Tsunade se preocupa e envia Guy e sua equipe. O akatsuki e Gaara comeam o jutsu de selamento e os nove drages fantasmas.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Nove Caudas Se Liberta
programme.desc: Sakura trata Kankuro, deixando todos espantados com suas mos firmes. Vov Chiyo fica emocionada por Tsunade ter enviado sua prpria aprendiz e pela determinao de Sakura. Kankuro fornece informaes sobre os Akatsuki. Kakashi envia um co de caa ninja.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Misso Super Secreta Se Inicia
programme.desc: Pakkun acha o esconderijo dos Akatsuki. Temari recebe ordens para ajudar a proteger a aldeia. Vov Chiyo se oferece para ficar no lugar de Temari. Naruto e Sakura ficam chocados com a histria das bestas de cauda.
programme.sub-title: A Misso Super Secreta Se Inicia

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Orochimaru Versus Jinchuriki
programme.desc: A equipe Kakashi encontra Itachi Uchiha, de quem sofrera uma amarga derrota no passado. Guy e sua equipe comeam a lutar contra um amargo rival, Kisame, que lana um poderoso chakra para subjugar o ninja da folha. Seu jutsu aprisiona Neji, Lee e Tenten.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: As Lgrimas De Sakura
programme.desc: Guy se arrepende ao ver seus trs alunos presos. Determinado a parar Kisame, Guy o desafia usando o nunchaku. Sem oxignio, Tenten vai ficando fraca, e Guy se prepara para usar um jutsu secreto e proibido. Naruto cai no genjutsu de Itachi.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Segredo Da Batalha
programme.desc: Vov Chiyo e Sakura salvam Naruto do genjutsu de Itachi. Kakashi comea um contra-ataque e exibe toda sua destreza. Guy enfrenta dificuldades contra Kisame, mas o derrota com um poderoso jutsu. Os ninjas da folha conseguem derrotar seu arquiminigo.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: As Consequncias Da Traio
programme.desc: Kisame e Itachi parecem ter sido clones cujos poderes foram copiados por um jutsu de personificao. Vov Chiyo explica a conexo entre a besta de cauda e o jinchuriki. Sakura percebe que Naruto enfrenta o mesmo destino e lgrimas escorrem em seu rosto.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Pgina Inacabada
programme.desc: As equipes Kakashi e Guy fazem uma pausa. Quando a perseguio recomea, Kakashi explica a Chiyo que Naruto tambm um jinchuriki. Chiyo lamenta ter sido ela que selou o shukaku dentro de Gaara... Gaara engolfado por uma luz branca.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Infiltrao: O Covil Da Cobra!
programme.desc: As equipes Kakashi e Guy chegam ao esconderijo dos akatsuki, mas so parados por uma barreira de cinco selos. Neji usa seu byakugan para localizar os selos e os ninjas destroem a barreira. Naruto tem uma viso chocante. A equipe Guy encara uma armadilha.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Laos
programme.desc: Quebrar a barreira de cinco selos ativa uma armadilha, e a equipe Guy enfrenta cpias idnticas de si mesmos. Deidara e Sasori lutam para se apoderar do jinchuriki. Forado a seguir Naruto, Kakashi pede que vov Chiyo e Sakura no faam nada precipitado.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Algo Importante...
programme.desc: A luta entre av e neto comea. Para derrotar o verdadeiro Sasori dentro do boneco, Hiruko deve ser destrudo primeiro. S a prpria av consegue entender as armadilhas complexas de Sasori, mas Sakura que deve dar o golpe final. Que estratgia usaro?

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Histria Do lbum Ilustrado
programme.desc: Chiyo e Sakura expem Sasori, que no envelheceu nada nos ltimos vinte anos. Chiyo fica mais chocada com o segundo boneco que Sasori revela. Sasori foi quem planejou o desaparecimento do kazecage. Uma equipe ninja se dirige a um certo local.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Reencontro
programme.desc: Sakura fica cercada por uma nuvem de veneno e usa um papel bomba para se livrar da fumaa. Ela tenta capturar Sasori para for-lo a dar informaes sobre Orochimaru, invocando dois bonecos para esta batalha. Naruto e Kakashi ainda perseguem Deidara!

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Poder De Uchiha
programme.desc: Os bonecos criados de humanos podem comandar o jutsu que o humano usava enquanto vivo. Assim, o boneco do terceiro kazekage converte chakras em poderes magnticos. Chiyo e Sakura se protegem, Sasori faz um ataque implacvel. Sakura toma uma deciso.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Ttulo
programme.desc: Sakura revida o ataque da areia de ferro. Ela rapidamente comea a ler os padres de ataque do Sasori, que se prepara para usar seu chakra. O ataque da areia de ferro penetra o espao, Sakura atingida na mo e infectada pelo veneno!

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Pesadelo
programme.desc: Sakura destri o boneco do terceiro kazekage graas a um antdoto que ela tomou e que funciona durante cerca de trs minutos. Chiyo e Sakura decidem derrotar Sasori nesse prazo. Sasori usa seu ltimo trunfo. Naruto e Kakashi planejam capturar Deidara.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Vento
programme.desc: Sakura e Vov Chiyo derrotam Sasori, mas ele acaba revivendo. Chiyo invoca bonecos com a tcnica do ataque branco secreto, e Sasori aplica seu ataque vermelho secreto. O antdoto de Sakura perde efeito, mas ela e Chiyo iniciam uma decisiva batalha final!

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Contoro
programme.desc: Vov Chiyo usa o ltimo antdoto em Sakura. Sasori tenta pr fim vida de Vov Chiyo, mas ela revida e o derrota. Sakura atingida em um lugar vital, e a nica coisa que pode salv-la um jutsu que a Vov Chiyo criou uma vez para Sasori.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Despertar Do Sono Eterno
programme.desc: Os ninjas da equipe Guy se preocupam com o resultado da luta de Sakura e Vov Chiyo enquanto enfrentam suas cpias, que permanecem firmes! Naruto segue Deidara, que se apoderou de Gaara. A preparao para a nova tcnica de Kakashi est em andamento!

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Solido
programme.desc: Sakura corre para achar Naruto com Vov Chiyo, sofrendo envenenada. Kakashi revela seu mangekyo sharingan, um poderoso jutsu que transporta tudo o que o olho pode ver para outra dimenso. Naruto finalmente consegue salvar Gaara, mas fica enfurecido ...

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Um Novo Inimigo
programme.desc: Naruto perde o controle e o esprito da Raposa de Nove Caudas assume o comando. Kakashi consegue suprimir a Raposa de Nove Caudas. Deidara descobre a derrota de Sasori. A equipe Guy cerca Deidara, que tenta se explodir junto com os ninjas da folha!

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Impermanncia
programme.desc: Vov Chiyo realiza o jutsu de ressuscitao em Gaara. Gaara acorda cercado por Naruto e os outros e tambm por uma multido de ninjas da areia. Percebendo a verdade por trs do jutsu de ressuscitao, todos demonstram seu respeito por Chiyo.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Contato
programme.desc: Gaara e seus salvadores retornam Aldeia de Areia. Aps visitar o tmulo de Vov Chiyo, Naruto e os ninjas da Folha tm que partir. Deidara aparece ferido na frente de Zetsu e Tobi. Na Aldeia da Folha, algum tenta infiltrar um garoto na equipe Kakashi!

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Companheiro De Equipe!
programme.desc: Kakashi hospitalizado devido tenso causada por seu mangekyo sharinga. Apesar dos apelos de Shizune para enviar outra equipe, Tsunade afirma que enviar a equipe Kakashi para fazer o trabalho.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Boruto encontra Sasuke, seu professor, que voltou para a aldeia aps um longo perodo ausente.
programme.sub-title: Tticas para se dar bem com a sua filha

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Com medo de atrapalhar as misses, Namida decide parar de chorar para evitar que seu jutsu seja ativado acidentalmente.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Buscando melhorar a reputao do Cl Nara, um ancio do cl diz para Shikadai desistir de se tornar um ninja e virar um poltico.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Pssaros esto atacando os residentes de uma aldeia nos arredores Pas do Fogo. As equipes de Boruto e Sumire recebem uma misso em conjunto de identificar a causa dos ataques.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Seguindo as informaes dos aldees, Boruto e Sarada vo ao encontro de Jugo. No entanto, ao chegarem no local, o encontram transformado em um monstro feroz e sofrendo com os efeitos da Marca da Maldio.
programme.sub-title: Jugo e a Marca da Maldio

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Seguindo as ordens de Konohamaru, Sumire e o resto da Equipe 15 voltam para relatar a situao, mas no caminho so atacados por um inimigo misterioso.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Sumire consegue fugir com a ajuda de Nue e sai em busca de Wasabi e Namida quando, de repente, Jugo, Suigetsu e Karin aparecem.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Sarada e Karin tm dificuldades para lutar contra um inimigo que tem o poder de manipular livremente a Marca da Maldio.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Boruto e Suigetsu querem ajudar Jugo, mas no conseguem por conta dos sedativos que receberam. Enquanto isso, os pssaros com a Marca da Maldio comeam a se juntar e migrar!

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: A Equipe 7 enviada em uma misso para ajudar a capturar um ladro de joias, mas acaba perdendo o rastro dele.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Mitsuki se sente mal e decide passar no centro de pesquisa de Orochimaru. Mitsuki explica a Orochimaru que nunca teve sonhos enquanto dormia, mas que recentemente passou a sonhar.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Mirai Sarutobi, prima de Konohamaru, incumbida de escoltar Kakashi, o Sexto Hokage, e seu amigo Might Guy at as fontes termais.
programme.sub-title: O pergaminho dos ninjas do vapor: A misso de ranque S!

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Mirai e companhia chegam nas fontes termais na fronteira do Pas do Fogo com o Pas do Vapor, mas Mirai, que est sempre focada no trabalho, no consegue relaxar!
programme.sub-title: O pergaminho dos ninjas do vapor: A guerra de ces e gatos!

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations

programme.sub-title: O pergaminho dos ninjas do vapor: O hotel amaldioado!

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Mirai, Kakashi e Guy viajam com Tatsumi para uma aldeia com uma fonte termal secreta, mas descobrem que a fonte foi tapada com uma pedra!
programme.sub-title: O pergaminho dos ninjas do vapor: Batatinhas e a pedra gigante!

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Comovida com os esforos de Tatsumi para cumprir seu objetivo sozinha, Mirai decide dar uma pausa em sua misso e ajud-la.
programme.sub-title: O pergaminho dos ninjas do vapor: guas termais da ressurreio!

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Mirai sai do hotel com Tatsumi sem falar nada para Kakashi e Guy. Nas fontes termais, Mirai acredita ver Asuma, seu pai, mas h alguma coisa estranha.
programme.sub-title: O pergaminho dos ninjas do vapor: O rei da Mirai!

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Naruto e Shikamaru debatem sobre o que fazer com os participantes da Prova Chunin que no puderam concluir devido ao ataque dos Otsutsuki. Sasuke retorna e busca por pistas do Cl Otsutsuki.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations

programme.sub-title: Guerra por Procurao das Cartas X!

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: O av de Stan est fazendo 102 e quer se matar, mas como no pode fazer isso sozinho, pede a ajuda de Stan. Enquanto isso, a senhora Broflovski protesta contra um famoso programa da televiso um tanto quanto inapropriado.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Kenny esmagado pela Estao Espacial Mir e se transforma em um zumbi que d incio a uma enorme epidemia. Entretanto, o doutor diagnostica todos como se fosse apenas um caso de conjutivite.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Os rapazes encontram um objeto misterioso em uma escavao escolar e saem no jornal. Barbra Streisand aparece na cidade buscando o tal objeto, pois a ltima pea necessria para que ela possa se transformar em um monstro japons gigante.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Uma onda de crimes toma conta de South Park, galinhas so molestadas e Barbrady pede demisso.

programme.title: South Park

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Vrios habitantes de South Park esto ficando cada vez mais furiosos, e sem alguma razo aparente. Randy o principal responsvel para descobrir uma soluo para este problema. Enquanto isso, Kyle tenta "conseguir uma ereo".

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Cartman, Kyle e Stan enganam Tweek e Craig para que eles lutem um contra o outro. Enquanto isso, um dos professores est sendo atormentado por uma recordao de sua falecida namorada, e Kenny conquista um homem rico na aula de cozinha.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: A me de Cartman d um presente para ajud-lo a ganhar o concurso de soletrar. Trata-se de um "macaco da fontica". Neste concurso, os rapazes conhecem Marc e Rebecca, dois irmos que no vo para a escola, pois estudam em suas casas.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Cartman acha que muito maduro para sair com Stan, Kyle e Kenny, e decide buscar novos amigos na internet, mas termina se metendo em vrios problemas com pedfilos. Enquanto isso, Kenny tenta evitar que seus pais tenham outro filho.
programme.sub-title: Cartman entra para a ASNAMB (Associao De Ssias Norte-Americanos Do Marlon Brando)

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Cartman encontra um carregamento cheio de fetos abortados aps o tombamento de um caminho em um barranco. Em seguida, ele decide entrar para um novo negcio supostamente lucrativo: a venda de fetos mortos.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Os rapazes ganham muitos doces em um concurso, mas para conseguir o grande prmio, precisam do cupom vencedor, que aquele que ficou com Kenny antes de morrer.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Numa homenagem ao filme de 1981, Heavy Metal, os garotos esto tentando convencer Kenny a largar a ltima droga da moda que viciou rapidamente os alunos do ensino mdio.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Kenny leva sua namorada ao show dos Jonas Brothers, mas com segundas intenes. No entanto, durante o show, so distribudos a todos anis de pureza, levando os sonhos de Kenny por gua abaixo.

programme.title: South Park

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: A verdadeira identidade de Mysterion finalmente revelada. Enquanto isso, Guaxinim, desprezado por seus amigos super-heris, est com sede de vingana.

programme.desc: Guaxinim e amigos se encontram merc de Cartman, que agora tem o senhor das trevas, Cthulhu, trabalhando para ele. Kenny luta contra a maldio dos seus superpoderes atravs do seu alter ego, Mysterion.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Stan e Kyle se tornam prisioneiros do Pentgono at contarem exatamente como chegaram Terra da Imaginao. Cartman no desistir da aposta e quer que Kyle chupe suas bolas, conforme o combinado.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Quando esto na Terra da Imaginao, Stan e Butters tem que lutar contra um exrcito de foras imaginrias do mal. A Suprema Corte declara que as criaturas imaginrias no so reais e planeja destruir a Terra da Imaginao.

programme.title: We're No Angels
programme.desc: Humphrey Bogart plays one of his rare comedy roles in this jaunty excursion about three convicts - Joseph (Bogart), Albert (Aldo Ray) and Jules (Peter Ustinov) - who are plotting their escape from Devil's Island.

programme.title: Artists and Models
programme.desc: A goonish young man receives telepathic top secret information in his nightmares, which are used by his artist friend in comic strips. Foreign agents and the CIA get interested.

programme.title: The Thomas Crown Affair
programme.desc: Steve McQueen stars as a sophisticated but bored tycoon who pulls off a bank heist so stunning that even Boston's finest are baffled. Faye Dunaway is the sleek insurance investigator out to bring him in but who, ultimately, falls in love with him.

programme.title: The Reivers
programme.desc: From the Pulitzer Prize-Winning novel by William Faulkner, Steve McQueen stars in the story of a Mississippi boy who drives to Memphis with two rascals in his family's new cara 1905 Winton Flyer.

programme.title: The Great Escape
programme.desc: Steve McQueen, James Garner, and Richard Attenborough headline a stellar cast in one of the most ingenious and suspenseful adventure films of all time as a team of Allied soldiers mount a daring escape from an inescapable Nazi POW camp.

programme.title: The Train
programme.desc: Screen greats Burt Lancaster, Paul Scofield and Jeanne Moreau star in this suspense-laden tale of justice and retribution as a French Resistance fighter (Lancaster) attempts to stop a Nazi commander from looting the art treasures of Paris.

programme.title: Stalag 17
programme.desc: Laced with comedy and cynicism, this is the story of a group of GIs who are thrown together in the notorious German prison camp Stalag 17, their suspicions about one being a spy and their efforts to escape.

programme.title: The Great Raid
programme.desc: As World War II rages, the elite 6th Ranger Battalion is given a mission of heroic proportions: push 30 miles behind enemy lines and liberate over 500 American prisoners of war.

programme.title: Flags Of Our Fathers
programme.desc: From Academy Award-winning director Clint Eastwood and Academy Award-winner Steven Spielberg, comes the life stories of the six men who raised the flag at The Battle of Iwo Jima, a turning point in WWII.

programme.title: The Great Raid
programme.desc: As World War II rages, the elite 6th Ranger Battalion is given a mission of heroic proportions: push 30 miles behind enemy lines and liberate over 500 American prisoners of war.

programme.title: Apocalypto
programme.desc: As the Mayan kingdom faces its decline, a young man is taken on a perilous journey to a world ruled by fear and oppression.

programme.title: Striking Distance
programme.desc: Coming from a police family, Tom Hardy ends up fighting his uncle after the murder of his father. Tom believes the killer is another cop and goes on the record with his allegations. Demoted then to river duty, the killer taunts Tom.

programme.title: Zero Dark Thirty
programme.desc: For a decade, an elite team of intelligence and military operatives, working in secret across the globe, devoted themselves to a single goal: to find and eliminate Osama bin Laden. ZERO DARK THIRTY tells the story of history's greatest manhunt.

programme.title: Gladiator
programme.desc: A man robbed of his name and his dignity strives to win them back, and gain the freedom of his people, in this epic historical drama from director Ridley Scott.

programme.title: Jeepers Creepers

programme.title: Jeepers Creepers 2

programme.title: We Summon The Darkness

programme.desc: Winnie-The-Pooh: Blood and Honey follows Pooh and Piglet as they go on a rampage after Christopher Robin abandons them.

programme.title: Cooties

programme.title: Anna and the Apocalypse

programme.title: Reborn
programme.desc: Gokudera and Yamamoto suggest that they hang out in town. Suddenly, a boy falls from the sky. That boy has a deathperation flame on his head!

programme.desc: A drama based on Jimi Hendrix's life as he left New York City for London, where his career took off.

programme.title: Seven Swords
programme.desc: Seven exceptional warriors band together to protect a village from bounty hunters.

programme.desc: Raised by monks who taught him the Thai martial art of muay thai, Ting (Tony Jaa) is sent to Bangkok to retrieve the stolen head of the town's statue of the Buddha.

programme.title: Addams Family Values
programme.desc: The familys future grows bleak when the no-good nanny marries Fester and has the kids shipped off to summer camp. But Wednesday still has a Thing or two up her sleeve.

programme.title: Wuthering Heights
programme.desc: The greatest love story ever told, Wuthering Heights is an excitingly fresh and distinct take on the classic novel by Emily Bront.

programme.title: Emma
programme.desc: Emma is a mischievous beauty who sets up her single friends, making a hilariously tangled mess of their lives until she herself falls in love. Gwyneth Paltrow stars in this beloved adaptation of Jane Austen's novel.

programme.title: Nine
programme.desc: A feature film adaptation of the musical inspired by the Fellini film "8".

programme.title: In the Time of the Butterflies
programme.desc: Salma Hayek gives a powerful, passionate performance as an idealistic young woman who wages a daring struggle for freedom against a murderous dictator (Edward James Olmos) in this moving thriller that tells of the personal toll of political tyranny.

programme.title: Grace of Monaco
programme.desc: Academy Award-winner Nicole Kidman captures the beauty and elegance of Grace Kelly in this true story of her transition from Hollywood starlet to Princess of Monaco.

programme.title: Emma
programme.desc: Emma is a mischievous beauty who sets up her single friends, making a hilariously tangled mess of their lives until she herself falls in love. Gwyneth Paltrow stars in this beloved adaptation of Jane Austen's novel.

programme.desc: Roman Polanski directs and Johnny Depp stars in this supernatural thriller about a rare-book dealer who discovers a demonic manuscript.

programme.title: Brawl in Cell Block 99
programme.desc: When Bradley (Vince Vaughn) is sent to prison, he is forced to commit acts of violence that turn the place into a savage battleground.

programme.title: The Adderall Diaries
programme.desc: Nothing is what it seems in this riveting thriller, where a troubled writer (James Franco) is thrown into a passionate affair and forced to confront the secrets of his past while investigating a scandalous high-profile murder.

programme.title: Limitless
programme.desc: A mysterious pill that enables the user to access 100% of his brain's abilities transforms a struggling writer into a financial wizard, but it also puts him in a new world with many dangers.

programme.title: 57 Seconds
programme.desc: When a tech blogger lands an interview with a tech guru and stops an attack on him, he finds a mysterious ring that takes him back 57 seconds into the past.

programme.title: Sleepless
programme.desc: An undercover Las Vegas police officer with a connection to the criminal underworld scours a nightclub in search of his kidnapped son.

programme.title: Enemy at the Gates
programme.desc: Two Russian and German snipers play a game of cat-and-mouse during the Battle of Stalingrad.

programme.title: Killing Me Softly
programme.desc: Woman suspects husband of murdering previous lovers.

programme.title: The Master
programme.desc: Haunted by his past, WW-II veteran and drifter Freddie Quell (Joaquin Phoenix) crosses paths with a mysterious movement led by The Master (Phillip Seymour Hoffman) and his wife (Amy Adams).

programme.title: Night Catches Us
programme.desc: Philadelphia, 1976. After years of mysterious absence, Marcus returns to the neighborhood where he came of age in the midst of the Black Power movement. While his arrival raises suspicion among his family and former neighbors.

programme.title: Air
programme.desc: From award-winning director Ben Affleck, Air reveals the game-changing partnership between a then undiscovered Michael Jordan and Nikes fledgling basketball division which revolutionized the world of sports and culture with the Air Jordan brand.

programme.title: Ginger & Rosa
programme.desc: In 1962 London, the lifelong friendship between two teenagers (Elle Fanning, Alice Englert) dissolves after one seduces the other's father.

programme.title: Bronson
programme.desc: With an intelligent, provocative and stylized approach, BRONSON (based on a true story) follows the metamorphosis of Mickey Peterson into Britains most violent prisoner, Charles Bronson.

programme.title: Lions for Lambs
programme.desc: Lions For Lambs tells the poignant and layered story of several individuals caught up at various ends of the U.S. War on terror.

programme.title: Flags Of Our Fathers
programme.desc: From Academy Award-winning director Clint Eastwood and Academy Award-winner Steven Spielberg, comes the life stories of the six men who raised the flag at The Battle of Iwo Jima, a turning point in WWII.

programme.title: Only the Brave
programme.desc: Only the Brave, based on the true story of the Granite Mountain Hotshots, is the heroic story of a team of local firefighters who through hope, determination, and sacrifice become one of the most elite firefighting teams in the nation.

programme.title: Salvation, The
programme.desc: The mighty Mads Mikkelsen unleashes a maelstrom of bloodshed in the Wild West in this white-knuckle tale of revenge, co-starring Eva Green.

programme.title: Jane Got a Gun
programme.desc: A woman asks her ex-lover for help in order to save her outlaw husband from a gang out to kill him.

programme.title: Sanctified

programme.title: The Homesman
programme.desc: Tommy Lee Jones stars in the best western since UNFORGIVEN (BBC). A low-life drifter helps a headstrong woman (Hilary Swank) cross the frontier after she rescues him from hanging.

programme.title: Sweet Country
programme.desc: Australian western set on the Northern Territory frontier in the 1920s, where justice itself is put on trial when an aged Aboriginal farmhand shoots a white man in self-defense and goes on the run as a posse gathers to hunt him down.

programme.title: Bone Tomahawk
programme.desc: When a group of cannibal savages kidnaps settlers from the small town of Bright Hope, an unlikely team of gunslingers, led by Sheriff Hunt (Kurt Russell), sets out to bring them home.

programme.title: I Kill Giants
programme.desc: A woman stands between giants and destruction of her town.

programme.title: Labyrinth
programme.desc: Sixteen-year-old Sarah must solve a labyrinth to rescue her baby brother when he is taken by the Goblin King.

programme.title: The Golden Child
programme.desc: As The Chosen One, Murphys on a madcap mission to save The Golden Child, a youth with mystical powers whos been abducted by an evil cult.

programme.title: The Adventures of Tintin
programme.desc: Tintin and his friends discover directions to a sunken ship commanded by Capt. Haddock's ancestor and go off on a treasure hunt.

programme.title: Young Sherlock Holmes
programme.desc: When a plague of bizarre, puzzling murders grip London, young Holmes and his new found friend Watson find themselves unwittingly entangled in the dark mystery.

programme.title: The Last Witch Hunter
programme.desc: The last witch hunter (Vin Diesel) is all that stands between humanity and the combined forces of the most horrifying witches in history.

programme.title: Love and Monsters
programme.desc: In a monster-infested world, Joel (Dylan O'Brien) learns his high school sweetheart (Jessica Henwick) is just 80 miles away. Now, Joel must discover his inner hero, facing unknown dangers on the impossible journey to be with the girl of his dreams.

programme.title: Skyline
programme.desc: Jarrod and Elaine travel to Los Angeles to meet his friend Terry and his wife Candice. Terry gives a party in his apartment for Jarrod. The next morning, the group is awakened by beams of light. The group of friends try to escape from the alien invaders.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible - Ghost Protocol
programme.desc: Agent Ethan Hunt and his elite team go underground after a bombing implicates them as terrorists. While trying to clear their name, the team uncovers a plot to start a nuclear war.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible - Rogue Nation
programme.desc: Ethan and team take on their most impossible mission yet, eradicating the Syndicate - an International rogue organization as highly skilled as they are, committed to destroying the IMF.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible
programme.desc: Ethan Hunt, a secret agent, is framed for the deaths of his espionage team and attempts to flee government assassins after him. He races against the clock in order to discover the truth.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible II
programme.desc: The world's greatest spy, Ethan Hunt, returns and partners up with the beautiful Nyah Hall to stop renegade agent Sean Ambrose from releasing a new kind of terror on an unsuspecting world.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible III
programme.desc: Ethan Hunt hurdles into spectacular new adventures from Rome to Shanghai as he races to rescue a captured agent and stop Davian from eliminating his next target, Ethans wife.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible - Ghost Protocol
programme.desc: Agent Ethan Hunt and his elite team go underground after a bombing implicates them as terrorists. While trying to clear their name, the team uncovers a plot to start a nuclear war.

programme.title: Kalifornia
programme.desc: A graduate student and his girlfriend set out on a cross-country road trip to research a book they are writing on serial killers. Along the way, they pick up an ex-con and his girlfriend who will take them on a ride they'll never forget.

programme.title: From Dusk Till Dawn
programme.desc: In this thrilling cult classic, two dangerous outlaw brothers head out on a wild crime spree. After kidnapping a father and his two kids, the bad guys head to a seedy Mexican bar for safety but come face to face with blood-sucking vampires.

programme.title: F/X
programme.desc: Rollie Tyler, a movie special-effects man, accepts $30,000 from the Justice Department's Witness Relocation Program to stage the fake assassination of a mob figure who has agreed to name names.

programme.title: The Boondock Saints
programme.desc: Two Irish Catholic brothers become vigilantes and wipe out Boston's criminal underworld in the name of God.

programme.title: From Dusk Till Dawn
programme.desc: In this thrilling cult classic, two dangerous outlaw brothers head out on a wild crime spree. After kidnapping a father and his two kids, the bad guys head to a seedy Mexican bar for safety but come face to face with blood-sucking vampires.

programme.title: Kung Fu Hustle
programme.desc: Stephen Chow is at it again with his newest action-packed and comedic martial-arts adventure, KUNG FU HUSTLE. Rated: R

programme.title: Cutthroat Island
programme.desc: A female pirate and her companion race against their rivals to find a hidden island that contains a fabulous treasure.

programme.title: Cheech & Chong's Nice Dreams
programme.desc: NICE DREAMS - it rhymes with ice creams. And that's what Cheech and Chong are selling in this wacky comedy. The outrageous, permanently spaced-out duo sells enough of their 'specially mixed' ice cream to take the cash and realize their dreams. Rated: R

programme.title: Faceless After Dark
programme.desc: Following her breakout success as the star of a killer clown horror flick, Bowie now finds herself struggling to capitalize on its success. But when she is held hostage by an unhinged fan posing as that same killer clown, horror becomes her reality.

programme.title: Lamb
programme.desc: In rural Iceland, a childless couple discovers a strange and unnatural newborn in their sheep barn. They raise her as their own, but sinister forces are determined to return the creature to the wilderness that birthed her.

programme.title: The Babadook
programme.desc: In this terrifying thriller, a mother must protect her son from an evil, supernatural entity that has escaped the pages of a children's book and is lurking in their home.

programme.title: Carrie
programme.desc: Angela Bettis stars in this adaptation of Stephen King's classic tale of horror. Carrie White has been cursed with the power of telekinesis and when her tormenters commit an act of unforgivable humiliation, they'll soon learn a deadly lesson.

programme.title: The Dark Half
programme.desc: A writer undergoes an operation that reveals a twin in his brain. He begins a double writing life, using a pseudonym for his disreputable best-sellers. When the pseudonym discovers he is to be eradicated, he goes on a murderous rampage.

programme.title: Maximum Overdrive
programme.desc: After a mysterious comet turns every machine on Earth into a homicidal rampage device, the survivors at the Dixie Boy Truck Stop are making a stand, and human vengeance goes into overdrive.

programme.title: Clive Barker's Lord Of Illusions
programme.desc: Scott Bakula ("Sibling Rivalry") portrays Harry DAmour, a private detective visiting Los Angeles on a routine investigation. Harry gets more than he bargains for when he encounters Philip Swan (Kevin J. OConnor, "The Mummy").

programme.title: Nightbreed: The Director's Cut
programme.desc: Boone may be a troubled young man, but his troubles are just beginning. Set up as the fall guy in a string of slasher murders, he decides he'll hide by crossing the threshold that separates us from them.

programme.title: Blow Out
programme.desc: A Philadelphia sound-effects man witnesses and records a car accident that turns out to be a politically motivated murder.

programme.title: Miami Blues
programme.desc: An ex-con (Alec Baldwin) tiptoes on the borderline of psychotic behavior, playing cops and robbers on both sides of the law. He robs and kills one minute and poses as a cop the next in this thriller with a comic edge.

programme.title: Thief
programme.desc: Michael Mann directs this stylishly photographed action-packed drama that stars James Caan as a master safe cracker who is planning his last heist for the sake of a woman (Tuesday Weld).

programme.title: F/X
programme.desc: Rollie Tyler, a movie special-effects man, accepts $30,000 from the Justice Department's Witness Relocation Program to stage the fake assassination of a mob figure who has agreed to name names.

programme.title: Miracle Mile
programme.desc: Good natured musician learns that the U.S. has fired a nuclear warhead which means that the end of the world is about an hour away.

programme.desc: Our non-heinous heroes Bill (Alex Winter) and Ted (Keanu Reeves) are in danger of flunking history! But when the righteous Rufus (George Carlin) arrives in a time-traveling phone booth, the dense dudes discover their destiny!

programme.title: Top Secret!
programme.desc: Top Secret! pits American rock star Nick Rivers against the dreaded East German High Command. It's a race against time as Nick teams up with Hillary Flammond to find her father.

programme.title: UHF

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Tired of Kaiba's insults, Joey challenges Kaiba for third place in the Battle City Tournament! Has Joey mastered enough strategies to take down the top dog, or is Kaiba going to wallop Joey like a pathetic puppy?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba attacks with his mighty Blue-Eyes White Dragon, but Joey has no monsters to defend with! Joey's luck has run out, so it's time for him to rely on skill!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey and Kaiba's battle reaches its roaring climax! Will Joey take down his biggest headache and actually teach Kaiba a thing or two about being a true duelist?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's the critical Battle City showdown with the fate of the world at stake: Yami Yugi vs. Marik! If Yami Yugi loses, Yugi is taking a permanent vacation into the Shadow Realm!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Marik proves his The Winged Dragon of Ra is the strongest Egyptian God Card by destroying Slifer the Sky Dragon! None of Yugi's cards can withstand its assault, but a gift from Kaiba may turn the duel around

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi can't strike Marik's life points, and with every turn that passes, Marik is one step closer to taking down Yugi with a final strike from The Winged Dragon of Ra...

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: With Yugi at the end of his ropes and the maniacal Marik waging all-out war, can Marik's oldest friend reach Marik in time to help him come to his senses before his insanity overwhelms him?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Will the combined force of all of Yugi's monsters be enough to defeat an Egyptian God that terminated two other powerful Egyptian Gods? The fate of the world hangs in the balance with the finale of the Battle City Tournament!

programme.desc: KaibaCorp Island is set to explode in mere minutes, but the blimp's engines are offline! Can Yugi and friends escape from the island in time, or will they sink to the bottom of the sea?

programme.desc: As Ta and Serenity tour around the Town of Domino and reminisce about their friends' battles during Battle City, they learn how much they've grown and far they've come... and how far they have left to go!

programme.desc: The three Egyptian God Cards are stolen! A terrifying new villain emerges! Real monsters begin to appear around the world! Can Yugi and the gang discover how these strange events are connected before the planet is destroyed?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: With Seal of Orichalcos, not only can Gurimo have ten monsters at once, but each creature receives a power boost from Orichalcos's malevolent energies! Yugi better find a way to protect himself against Gurimo's horde!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Not only is our world on the brink of apocalypse, but an entire domain of monsters is also on the verge of collapse! Both Earth and the monster domain must unite and fight against the largest terror they have ever faced!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and the gang set off on a cross-country trek when they're asked for help from a one-eyed former foe.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba returns to Duelist Kingdom for a showdown against Pegasus! Will Kaiba discover the secret behind Pegasus's strategies before he loses his soul, just like he did on his first trip to Duelist Kingdom?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Not only does Alister's fiend gain attack points for every fiery monster on the field, but it can also take control of Kaiba's monsters! Will Alister get his revenge, or will Kaiba get aid from the monster domain?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.desc: With the potent powers of Claw of Hermos, Joey transforms Time Wizard into an almighty... hammer? Can Joey master the uncanny abilities of his new card to pound Mai's Harpie Ladies before they slash him to shreds?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Using the abilities of Seal of Orichalcos, Yugi grinds Rafael's guardians, but he's also succumbing to the card's evil influence. As darkness grows within his heart, the consequences of his non-heroic acts may be his undoing.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Dartz has captured Yugi's soul! Broken and unmotivated, how will our heroes ever rescue Yugi, especially when Dartz has a duo of nefarious new recruits ready to eradicate them?

programme.desc: A cross-country expedition turns tragic when Dartz's new duelists separate Yugi from Joey in order to capture their souls separately.

programme.desc: Nothing will stop Weevil and Rex Raptor from quenching their thirst for revenge by capturing Yugi and Joey's souls!

programme.desc: A look back at Frankys past reveals the amazing origins of the sea train and paints a vivid picture of his younger days, spent alongside Iceberg and the legendary shipwright Tom!
